text: Dolores Costello (September 17, 1903Costello's obituary in The New York Times says that she was born on September 17, 1905. â€“ March 1, 1979) was an American actress. She worked during the silent movie era. She was in movies such as The Telephone and A Midsummer Night's Dream. She was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:American movie actors Category:1903 births Category:1979 deaths
title: Dolores Costello
